testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.title: QA Engineer at Microsoft
testimonials.review: Vignesh's Playwright course helped me transition from manual testing to automation. The hands-on approach and real-world examples made all the difference.

testimonials.name: Mike Chen
testimonials.title: SDET at Google
testimonials.review: The Selenium framework course was exactly what I needed. Vignesh's industry experience shows in every lesson. Got promoted within 6 months!

testimonials.name: Aisha Patel
testimonials.title: Test Lead at Amazon
testimonials.review: Best investment in my career! The corporate training session for our team was exceptional. Clear explanations and practical examples.

testimonials.name: David Kumar
testimonials.title: Senior QA Engineer at Netflix
testimonials.review: Amazing course structure! Vignesh breaks down complex concepts into digestible pieces. The practice labs were incredibly helpful.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.title: QA Lead at Spotify
testimonials.review: Transitioned from manual to automation testing within 3 months. Vignesh's mentoring approach is what made the difference.

testimonials.name: James Wilson
testimonials.title: SDET at Uber
testimonials.review: Learned to build robust test frameworks from scratch. The course content is industry-relevant and up-to-date.

testimonials.name: Alex Martinez
testimonials.title: QA Automation Engineer at Tesla
testimonials.review: Made the switch from manual to automation testing seamlessly. Vignesh's teaching style is clear and the examples are practical. Now leading a team of 5 automation engineers!

testimonials.name: Lisa Wong
testimonials.title: Senior QA at Adobe
testimonials.review: The API testing course was comprehensive and well-structured. Helped me advance from mid-level to senior QA role within 8 months. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Robert Johnson
testimonials.title: Test Automation Lead at IBM
testimonials.review: Outstanding content on modern testing practices. Applied the learnings to build our entire automation strategy. The course pays for itself within weeks!
